15 May 2010

Camera

by Aaron Lord

Just a quick note to say I finally found the charger for the old Nikon 5400 I bought from James, and I also found a USB sync cable on eBay. All this just in time for the pending birth of our son. (Yeah right, she says, he’s never coming out.) So you will likely see some more pictures from us soon.
